name: xavil-syntax

0.3.0.name: xavil-syntax
0.3.0.description: A nice, dark monocolor blue theme with plenty of color.

readme:
# Xavil's Theme

[![Github Releases](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/XavilPergis/xavil-theme/latest/total.svg?maxAge=2592000&style=flat-square)]() ![Primary Color](https://img.shields.io/badge/Primary%20Color-%2314ade8-14ade8.svg?style=flat-square) [![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/XavilPergis/xavil-theme.svg?maxAge=2592000&style=flat-square)]()

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XavilPergis/xavil-theme/master/assets/theme.png)

This theme goes very well with the [Material UI theme](https://atom.io/themes/atom-material-ui)

**Please create an issure on the tracker if either:**
- Something goes horribly wrong and/or breaks and/or bugs out
- You have a suggestion on how to make the theme better
- Think there should be special support for a language (and preferably what to do)
